name: Steel Diver™: Sub Wars
description:
From the second half of March, 2023,
it will no longer be possible to upgrade
to the Premium Version of the game or
purchase extra submarines.
Afterwards, those who have not
upgraded to the Premium Version of the
game will only be able to play some
missions and use some submarines.
In order to play all missions and use
all submarines, you will need to
upgrade to the Premium Version
of the game before the second
half of March, 2023.

Dive, dive, dive for strategic
subaquatic combat! Amass a fleet of
submarines and blow your opponents
out of the water in Steel Diver: Sub
Wars. Pilot your sub in first-person
view, with total control over its speed,
depth and direction, and use tactics
and tenacity to win the day!



In the purchasable Premium Version,
unlock and command up to 18 unique
submarines across seven varied
missions. Try the first two missions
and two basic submarines for yourself
in the Free Version!
